text: Stanley Benjamin Kirsch (July 15, 1968 â€“ January 11, 2020) was an American actor, screenwriter, director, and acting coach. He was born in New York City. He has made guest appearances in some TV shows including JAG, Family Law, and Friends. Kirsch appeared in the short-lived Saturday morning TV series Riders in the Sky and on the soap opera General Hospital in 1992. On January 11, 2020, Kirsch was found dead in his Los Angeles home, aged 51. The cause of death was suicide by hanging. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Suicides by hanging in the United States Category:American television actors Category:Educators from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Movie directors from New York City
title: Stan Kirsch
